summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4361 for the improvement of Juneau Street from 51st Avenue South to 52nd Avenue South, and certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 51640, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
